descriptionlist.description:
The most customizeable dock for any theme.
Customizations:
1. Color
2. Size(height and width)
3. Opacity/Translucency
4. Location(anywhere)
5. Corner Roundness
Get the perfect dock without the annoyances of the ipad dock animations and the incompatibilities with Exsto that many dock replacements have.
I recommend using a tweak such as MiDevice or Springtomize4 to get the amount of icons you'd like and possibly for spacing. I use MiDevice with 7 icons in the dock with 1 blank icon on either side from BlankIcons to create a compact 5 icon dock.
